member.name: ALTTABINFO
member.summary: Contains status information for the application-switching (ALT+TAB) window.

member.name: ALTTABINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the structure. The caller must set this to sizeof(ALTTABINFO).

member.name: ALTTABINFO.cItems
member.summary: The number of items in the window.

member.name: ALTTABINFO.cColumns
member.summary: The number of columns in the window.

member.name: ALTTABINFO.cRows
member.summary: The number of rows in the window.

member.name: ALTTABINFO.iColFocus
member.summary: The column of the item that has the focus.

member.name: ALTTABINFO.iRowFocus
member.summary: The row of the item that has the focus.

member.name: ALTTABINFO.cxItem
member.summary: The width of each icon in the application-switching window.

member.name: ALTTABINFO.cyItem
member.summary: The height of each icon in the application-switching window.

member.name: ALTTABINFO.ptStart
member.summary: The top-left corner of the first icon.
